title: A refactored biosynthetic pathway for the production of glycosylated microbial sunscreens
content:

Sıla Arsın, Maija Pollari, Endrews Delbaje, Jouni Jokela, Matti Wahlsten, Perttu Permi, David Fewer
MAA biosynthetic enzymes encoded in two distant sections of the genome work together to form two diglycosylated MAA structural variants.
